resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82150</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82150</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5029</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Nuts and Bolts</string>
            <string language="es">Tuercas y tornillos</string>
            <string language="ga">Cnónna agus Boltaí</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Muttern und Schraubbolzen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écrous et boulons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Porcas e parafusos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dadi e bulloni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καρύδια και μπουλόνια</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this activity, an array of nuts and bolts, of distinctly different sizes, are lined up on the table. The child first matches the nut to the bolt, then screws the nut on.</string>
            <string language="es">En esta actividad se alinean sobre una mesa un conjunto de tuercas y tornillos de distintos tamaños. El niño primero asocia la tuerca con el tornillo y después lo enrosca.</string>
            <string language="ga">Sa ghníomhaíocht seo, cuirtear go leor cnónn aagus boltaí de mhéideanna difriúla ar an mbord. Faigheann an leanbh an cnó agus bolta ceart agus ansin cuireann siad le chéile iad.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physical Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación física. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Corpoideachas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Aktivität werden eine Reihe Muttern 
und Schraubbolzen, der deutlich unterschiedlichen Größen, auf der 
Tabelle ausgerichtet. Das Kind erstes bringt die Mutter zum 
Schraubbolzen, schraubt dann die Mutter an zusammen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette activité, un alignement d'écrous et 
des boulons, des tailles distinctement différentes, sont alignés sur
la table. L'enfant premier apparie l'écrou au boulon, visse 
alors l'écrou en fonction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta atividade, uma disposição das porcas e os
parafusos, de tamanhos distintamente diferentes, são alinhados acima 
na tabela. A criança primeira combina a porca ao parafuso, 
parafusa então a porca sobre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa attività, un allineamento dei dadi ed 
i bulloni, dei formati distintamente differenti, sono allineati sulla 
tabella. Il bambino primo abbina il dado al bullone, allora 
avvita il dado sopra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα, μια σειρά καρυδιών και 
μπουλονιών, των ευδιάκριτα διαφορετικών μεγεθών, παρατάσσεται 
στον πίνακα. Το παιδί αρχικά ταιριάζει με το καρύδι το 
μπουλόνι, βιδώνει έπειτα το καρύδι επάνω.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leibeserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική αγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
